name: Makeover Merge
description:
Start your adventure in the Makeover Merge show by taking the director’s seat! Dive into the story and make friends with the team. Help the nominees discover new makeup, hairstyles, fashion choices, and a better environment that suit their needs and vibes. Customize various looks. Renovate and decorate their spaces. Oppose the sabotage and evil plans of the former director. Solve puzzles, merge items, and fulfill the orders to explore new outfits, exquisite furniture, or fabulous haircuts. And don’t forget to get ready for a big reveal!

MAKE CHOICES
Red or blue wallpaper? Long waves of hair or a classic bob haircut? To beard, or not to beard? Take good care of your nominees and choose what’s best for them!

MERGE ITEMS
Explore the diversity of the elements on the board. Achieve your goals by collecting and merging items using numerous combinations that the objects offer. Rise to the challenges of the puzzles to earn great rewards!

HAIR AND MAKEUP
Everyone can enjoy a nice cooling mask and a couple of cucumber slices on the eyes from time to time. Aid the nominees in exploring the new ways of treating their hair and skin.

CLOTHES AND FASHION
Job interview in pajamas? Working clothes for the first date? You can stop this style crisis! Just help your participant by choosing between delightful options that your stylist suggests.

INTERIOR DESIGN
The spider webs and old dusty armchairs have to go! Redesign, restore, and redecorate the spaces to suit the tastes and needs of your nominees.
